articles.author: Tanishq Vaddi
articles.title: India vs Australia Live Score, 3rd ODI: Rohit Sharma and Washington Sundar start the chase - The Indian Express
articles.description: India vs Australia 3rd ODI Live Score:  Australia have won the toss and they have opted to bat first in the third and final match of the ODI series in Rajkot.
articles.content: "Yeah, much much better. I've heard, it was pretty hot in Mohali. Decent temperature here. Just looking forward to the game. It is important, more than the physical it's mentally, take some time off … [+704 chars]
